original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū khambhakatā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū khambha katāḥ antara ghare gacchanti pe
na khambhakataḥ antaraghare gamissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā khambhaṁ katvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca ekatas vā ubhatas vā khambham katvā antaraghare gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa
